quote: All my life I'd been told what to believe about politics, coloreds, being a girl. But with Constantine's thumb pressed in my hand, I realized I actually had a choice in what I could believe.
quote_letters: ALL MY LIFE ID BEEN TOLD WHAT TO BELIEVE ABOUT POLITICS COLOREDS BEING A GIRL BUT WITH CONSTANTINES THUMB PRESSED IN MY HAND I REALIZED I ACTUALLY HAD A CHOICE IN WHAT I COULD BELIEVE
